attributes.action: have a general election upon Tony Blair steppin down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Upon the stepping down of the prime minister, i feel that the country has a right to request a general election, in order for us to have more or a say in who runs this country. This country is run by us - the people, not one government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
